src:
Scomparso a 51 anni Alberto Rivolta, difensore nell’Inter dei record del Trap
Aveva solo 51 anni, da 25 soffriva per un rarissimo ependinoma midollare, un tumore del sistema nervoso centrale che l’aveva costretto in carrozzina. Vinse lo scudetto nella stagione 1988/1989
02 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Redazione Sport
Aveva soltanto 51 anni, Alberto Rivolta, morto domenica a Monza dopo 25 anni di calvario: soffriva ependimoma midollare, un tumore rarissimo del sistema nervoso centrale che da tempo l’aveva costretto alla carrozzella. Rivolta giocava in difesa nell’Inter dei record di Giovanni Trapattoni, quello che vinse lo scudetto nel campionato 1988/1989.
text:
Alberto Rivolta, a defender at Inter of Trap's records, disappeared at the age of 51
He was only 51 years old, from 25 he suffered from a very rare medullar ependinoma, a tumor of the central nervous system that had forced him into a wheelchair. He won the Scudetto in the 1988/1989 season
02 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Redazione Sport
He was only 51 years old, Alberto Rivolta, who died Sunday at Monza after 25 years of calvary: he suffered medullar ependymoma, a very rare tumor of the central nervous system that had for some time forced him to wheelchair. Rivolta played in defense in the Inter record of Giovanni Trapattoni, the one who won the championship in the 1988/1989 championship.
